content: Zhen Xie - Our Faculty | School of Computing | Binghamton University Skip to main content School of Computing Our Faculty Zhen Xie Assistant Professor School of Computing zxie3@binghamton.edu 607-777-4595 EB N14 BackgroundXie joined the School of Computing as an assistant professor in August 2023. His research emphasizes on high-performance computing (HPC) with a focus on the interaction between machine learning algorithms and system-level performance optimization. His work has been published in multiple top-tier conferences and journals, including PPoPP, SC, ICS, EuroSys, Euro-Par, TPDS, and TACO, and he has received ACM Gordon Bell Special Prize in 2022. He received his PhD from the Chinese Academy of Sciences.
